scripts.test: npm run clean:reports && npx cypress-tags run --headless --browser chrome -e TAGS="@assesment" || npm run generate:html:report
scripts.test:windows: npx cypress-tags run --headless --browser chrome -e TAGS="@assesment" || npm run generate:html:report
scripts.clean:reports: mkdir -p mochawesome-report/ && rm -R -f mochawesome-report/* && mkdir -p TestReport/ && rm -rf TestReport/*
scripts.generate:html:report: npm run merge:reports && npm run create:html:report
